text.section: If a partner's dissociation results in a dissolution and winding up of the partnership business, Subtitle 8 of this title applies; otherwise, Subtitle 7 of this title applies.

Upon a partner's dissociation:
The partner's right to participate in the management and conduct of the partnership business terminates, except as otherwise provided in § 9A-803 of this title;
The partner's duty of loyalty under § 9A-404(b)(3) of this title terminates; and
The partner's duty of loyalty under § 9A-404(b)(1) and (2) of this title and duty of care under § 9A-404(c) of this title continue only with regard to matters arising and events occurring before the partner's dissociation, unless the partner participates in winding up the partnership's business pursuant to § 9A-803 of this title.
